On [[5 December]] [[1956]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to a Mr Britten'''.<ref name=TS>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.facebook.com/groups/TheTolkienSociety.EducationalCharity/permalink/10154958294156068/|articlename=Tolkien Society Facebook group discussion|dated=|website=FB|accessed=4 April 2017}}</ref><ref name=BBC>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/b08ll5zq|articlename=BBC Caversham Park 1 (aired 2 April 2017; ca. 15 min. mark.)|dated=2 April 2017|website=[http://www.bbc.co.uk/ bbc.co.uk]|accessed=2 April 2017}}</ref>

*'''Contents:''' In the letter, Tolkien appears to mainly be discussing a portrait at [[Wikipedia:King's College, Cambridge|King's College]], [[Cambridge]].<ref name=TS/><ref name=BBC/>
*'''Description:''' One-page, handwritten letter.<ref name=TS/><ref name=BBC/>
